actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to extend for an additional 12 months (through June 30, 1976) the existing provisions of law with respect to eligibility of supplemental security income recipients to participate in the food stamp program.

summary.text: Extends for an additonal twelve months (through June 30, 1976) the eligibility of supplemental security income recipients qualified under the Social Security Act to participate in the food stamp program.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to extend for an additional 12 months (through June 30, 1976) the existing provisions of law with respect to eligibility of supplemental security income recipients to participate in the food stamp program.
